name: Less Is More (25 player)
descr: Defeat Sartharion the Onyx Guardian and the Twilight Drakes with fewer than 21 players in 25-player mode.
tooltip:
Less Is More (25 player)

Defeat Sartharion the Onyx Guardian and the Twilight Drakes with fewer than 21 players in 25-player mode.

Criteria:
- Vesperon
- Shadron
- Tenebron
- Sartharion the Onyx Guardian
